attachments.title: The Roomba for Lawns Is Really Pissing Off Astronomers | WIRED
attachments.text: The company that makes the Roomba is now reportedly working on a lawnmower, unless astronomers get their way.
attachments.fallback: WIRED: The Roomba for Lawns Is Really Pissing Off Astronomers | WIRED

text: lawnmowers using a portion of the radio spectrum to mow lawns. This does sound problematic to astronomers, but maybe they partner up? put tiny telescopes on the lawnmowers, network all the lawnmowers together to create the world's largest radio telescope!
or, since the radio solution iRobot proposes is about "beacons", why not BTLE?
"In a nutshell, the FCC doesnâ€™t want people creating ad hoc networks of transmitters..."
